title: Danish PM calls snap election with Greenland issue centre-stage
summary_full: The issue of Greenland, which Donald Trump wants to annex, is likely to dominate the election campaign.
summary_public: The issue of Greenland, which Donald Trump wants to annex, is likely to dominate the election campaign.
